summary:
This MOD is hardcore MOD for decreasing craft ability of player character.
If you active this MOD, your character will get 3 effects.

-New enchantments are 40% weaker.
-Potions and poisons you make are 40% weaker.
-If you improve armor and weapons at forges, it will 40% weaker than improved in vanilla game.
descriptionHtml:
This MOD is hardcore MOD for decreasing craft ability of player character.
If you active this MOD, your character will get 3 effects.

-New enchantments are 40% weaker.

-Potions and poisons you make are 40% weaker.

-If you improve armor and weapons at forges, it will 40% weaker than improved in vanilla game.


This MOD will not prevent you learning any kind of perks.
So you can give up getting craft skills or push aside these difficulties.

Anyway, all potions and magic-items you have got in your adventure are more reliable.
And when those aren't obtained, you should depend on your own crafting items.

If you still think of yourself as god of craft, you'd die.
author: SasameSnow
